attributes.action: Legislate for one single chat and voice protocol on the Internet
attributes.additional_details:
Have you got friends/colleagues on more than one of the following platforms on your smart phone, tablet, desktop, laptop, server? Then this petition is for you.

AIM
Apple Messages/iMessage
Blackberry Messenger
Facebook Chat
Gadu Gadu
Google Talk
IBM Sametime
ICQ
IRC
Jabber
KIK
Microsoft MSN
Microsoft Communicator
Myspace
Skype
What's App
Yahoo
etc.

Fed up with having numerous chat clients for communicating with people via text and voice? Yes, it's madness.

Let's move to one open software protocol so they all integrate nicely together, introduce leglislation so the companies are encouraged to adopt one standard, and lobby other countries to do the same.
